name: Ascension (Faro.Mars.07)
description:
»Use the arrows or WASD key to move the character and Spacebar to jump«

This is my first Game Jam for the Brackeys Game Jam 2022!

You have to get out of the weird Tower without getting hit! Beware of the Blobs and Birds!

Feel free to put some advices so I can make better game and tips to make it easier for me me to do it or better understand the making process, or the coding!
